actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Greatsword attack and two Slam attacks or it makes three Throwing Axe attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Throwing Axe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/60' one target 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Impregnable Counter
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 ft. of the ironmonger misses a melee attack vs. it the attacker must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Gains 3 hp at the start of its turn. If the trollkin takes acid or fire this ability doesn't function at the start of its next turn. It dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn't regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Thick Skin
special_abilities.desc: Its skin is thick and tough granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class (already factored into its AC).
